TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but the rocket now runs on bobcats, along with every other mod.

I wish that the internet was nicer.

Granted. Now everyone is a hooker.

I wish this nasty cold sore on my lip would go away.

Granted, but it brings your lip with it.

I wish that I had a submarine sandwich submarine.

Granted,but it falls apart in the water

I wish for the ability to have kerbals in external seats from the beginning of the flight, not having to bring a separate vehicle

To the pad to put one on.

Uh, sure but its on fire.

I wish I knew what he meant.

Granted, but it doesn't make sense to anyone else.

I wish that the Gangnam Style video on youtube finally reached 2 billion views.

Granted. The internet collapses in on itself.

I wish to be home.

Granted, but it's on fire

I wish that I had a sense of humour

Granted ,but it was terrible.

I wish that i went to the north pole.

Granted, but you froze to death.

I wish to be famous!

Granted. Fanboy attack.

I wish I didn;t just imagine that.

Granted your ded

I wish that our Universe broke.

Granted, you LIVED it

I wish to read minds

Granted there is so many that your head explodes

I wish the universe was fixed.

Granted, but only with duct tape and baling twine

I wish for invincibility!

Granted ,but your ankle.

I wish that trekette went to space with a pod filled with gold.

Granted. You don't get any gold.

I wish I didn;t sound so depressing.

Granted ,but you were sniped by me

I wish rage got his wish.

Granted but his unrelenting cheeriness got you depressed

I wish for super strength!

Granted. Arm wrestle to death with a Sore-Loser-mode Chobit.

I wish I didn't place bets during that.

Granted you do it anyways.

I wish that I had 2 hearts.

Granted, you're a time lord and trapped in... something, I was never clear on that point...

I wish to tapdance

granted because the force your exert in a broken universe is unequal you cause the earthquake of 1760.

I wish i can slow down.

Granted, you cease all molecular motion

I wish to rule the games forum!

Granted. I must rule along side you.

I wish that People would stop abusing ragebot remote.
